t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 4 days ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million. The company was re-branded as Amazon and its infrastructure was used to expand Amazon's online platform in the Middle East.

t: Amazon in White House crosshairs over report of displaying tariff costs | Reuters
s: 4 weeks ago - Amazon said on Tuesday its low-cost Haul unit had considered listing import charges for goods in light of new U.S. tariffs but denied looking at such a plan for its main website, after the White House accused it of a hostile political act.

t: Chinese electronics company Anker starts raising prices on Amazon | Reuters
